title: Glitter Girls – Poseable 14-inch Doll Sashka & Surprise Birthday Party Set – Table & Chairs Furniture – Play Food Cake, Candy & Decoration Accessories – Toys for Kids Ages 3+
features: 62-piece birthday party set: plan sparkly celebrations with Sashka and the birthday party accessories!
Fun features: removable cake slice with 3 candles that fit inside the birthday cake to make wishes!
14-inch doll Sashka: bright green eyes, bendable arms and legs, and long, silky blonde hair that’s fun to brush and style!
Colorful fashion: wears a cupcake-print dress, leggings with decorative sprinkles, glitter shoes, and a sparkly hair bow.
Easy cleanup: cupcake box and candy jars keep treats neatly inside and always in reach.
Includes: poseable doll, table and chairs furniture set, birthday cake with removable slice, 3 candles, cupcake box, heart-shaped balloon, and party accessories.
Mix & match: compatible with most 14-inch dolls, outfits, and accessories.
Recommended age: suggested for kids ages 3+ (small parts); perfectly sized for small hands, easy to clean, and durable for everyday play.
description: Surprise! Plan dazzling celebrations for your Glitter Girls with Sashka & the Birthday Party accessories! Set the scene with the fully assembled table and chairs furniture, and add a colorful touch with the rainbow napkins, dinnerware accessories, and heart-shaped balloon decoration. Which of your dolls is celebrating their special day? Put on the birthday hat and sing "Happy Birthday" as you carry the cake on the cake stand! All 3 candles fit inside the cake to make a wish, and the removable slice lets you serve the birthday girl the first piece! Make the party even sweeter with the candy apples, lollipops, gumdrops, and cupcakes. Then get ready for presents! Open up the card to read sweet messages and hand out the neatly wrapped gift box for a wonderful surprise. Each accessory is perfectly sized to fit in your Glitter Girls doll's hands. And for a quick clean up, the cupcake box and containers open to store the candy pieces until it's time to host another surprise party!
